title: Meg Mathews: 'I never expected to be so busy at this age'
text:
The menopause-awareness campaigner and former party planner, 53, has a daughter, Anaïs Gallagher, 19, and lives in Primrose Hill with her dog Ziggy

I never expected to be so busy and do such varied work at this age. I’ve had to make it a priority to carve out ‘Meg time’. I wake up around 5.30am and use the Calm app to guide me through meditation, breathing and stretching. Then I get ready for a relatively new addition to my routine: a run. I’m doing Couch to 5k, and I’m really proud of approaching this challenge in a balanced fashion, as opposed to my usual gung-ho manner.

Afterwards, I drink ice-cold oat milk with Meno Blend. Designed for perimenopausal and menopausal women, it consolidates...
description: The menopause-awareness campaigner and former party planner, 53, has  a daughter, Anaïs Gallagher, 19, and lives in Primrose Hill with her dog Ziggy
